page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: My name is Sarah.Iam nine years old and I have lived in this area all my life.On a school day I get up at half past seven.After getting dressed I go down for breakfast.I usually have cornflakes with milk and sugar.After this I collect my things together for school and put them in my bag.It takes me about twenty minutes to waik to school.At school my favourite lesson is mathematics.At playtime I play games with my friends.I stay for school dinners.we go home at half past three. when I get home I get changed into my old clothes and I watch television.After the childrens programmes I go next door for my friend and then we go and play in the park. We have tea about half past five,my favourite is chops and chips.I go to bed about nine thirty.
